Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

n, m: nat

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:

forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall net net' : network, (forall h : Net.name, nwState net h = nwState net' h) -> (forall p : packet, In p (nwPackets net') -> In p (nwPackets net)) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), (network -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
allEntries_leaderLogs_term = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (t : term) (e : entry) (h : Net.name), In (t, e) (allEntries (fst (nwState net h))) -> t = eTerm e \/ (exists (ll : list entry) (leader : Net.name), In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net leader))) /\ In e ll) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments allEntries_leaderLogs_term {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
handler = fun (P : BaseParams) (OneNodeParams0 : OneNodeParams P) => let (_, handler) := OneNodeParams0 in handler : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> input -> data -> output * data Arguments handler {P OneNodeParams}
no_entries_past_current_term_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (e : entry) (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> In e entries -> eTerm e <= t : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments no_entries_past_current_term_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
entries_gt_0_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In e es -> eIndex e > 0 : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments entries_gt_0_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
RaftInputHandler = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me : name) (inp : raft_input) (state : raft_data) => let '(handlerOut, state0, pkts) := handleInput me inp state in let '(leaderOut, state1, leaderPkts) := doLeader state0 me in let '(genericOut, state2, genericPkts) := doGenericServer me state1 in (handlerOut ++ leaderOut ++ genericOut, state2, pkts ++ leaderPkts ++ genericPkts) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, name -> raft_input -> raft_data -> list raft_output * raft_data * list (name * msg) Arguments RaftInputHandler {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
RaftNetHandler = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me src : name) (m : msg) (state : raft_data) => let (state0, pkts) := handleMessage src me m state in let '(leaderOut, state1, leaderPkts) := doLeader state0 me in let '(genericOut, state2, genericPkts) := doGenericServer me state1 in (leaderOut ++ genericOut, state2, pkts ++ leaderPkts ++ genericPkts) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, name -> name -> msg -> raft_data -> list raft_output * raft_data * list (name * msg) Arguments RaftNetHandler {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
logs_leaderLogs = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> exists (leader : Net.name) (ll es : list entry), In (eTerm e, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net leader))) /\ removeAfterIndex (log (snd (nwState net h))) (eIndex e) = es ++ ll /\ (forall e' : entry, In e' es -> eTerm e' = eTerm e) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments logs_leaderLogs {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
doGenericServer = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (h : name) (state : raft_data) => let (out, state0) := applyEntries h state (rev (filter (fun x : entry => (lastApplied state <? eIndex x) && (eIndex x <=? commitIndex state)) (findGtIndex (log state) (lastApplied state)))) in (out, RaftState.set_raft_data_lastApplied term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output state0 (if lastApplied state0 <? commitIndex state0 then commitIndex state0 else lastApplied state0), []) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params ->...-> list raft_output * raft_data * list (name * msg) Arguments doGenericServer {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
execute_log' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix execute_log' (log : list entry) (st : data) (l : list (input * output)) {struct log} : list (input * output) * data := match log with | [] => (l, st) | e :: log' => let '(o, st') := handler (eInput e) st in execute_log' log' st' (l ++ [(eInput e, o)]) end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, list entry -> data -> list (input * output) -> list (input * output) * data Arguments execute_log' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%list_scope _ _%list_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net net' : network) (gd : ghost_data) (d : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : Net.name) (d' : raft_data), reboot d = d' -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = (gd, d) -> (forall h' : Net.name, nwState net' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d') h') -> nwPackets net = nwPackets net' ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net net' : network) (gd : ghost_data) (d : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : Net.name) (d' : raft_data), reboot d = d' -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net' -> nwState net h = (gd, d) -> (forall h' : Net.name, nwState net' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d') h') ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
